resource_section: Migrant Employeeâ€™s Registration with the SLBFE by Gender 1986-2024
remarks: Dataset contains SLBFE (Sri Lanka Bureau of Foreign Employment) registration statistics by gender for 2024, showing the distribution of registered workers by gender. Columns: Year, Male, Male %, Female, Female %, and Total. Data shows that in 2024, there were 186,674 male registrations (59.30%) and 128,112 female registrations (40.70%), totaling 314,786 workers. This indicates a male majority in foreign employment registrations, though the gender gap has narrowed compared to previous years.
